Name: Robin's Quest
About the game: When an evil ruler greedily taxes his people to near starvation, there’s always one who rises against all odds to fight for what’s right ... but Fighting for the good of the people often results in fighting for one’s family. Help our brave new Hero rise from humble beginnings to becoming the champion of which stories are written for centuries. Features - Gather your band of merry men - Use unique skills to solve puzzles - New mini-games and archery competitions - Interact with characters, good and evil - Rob from the rich and give to the poor!
